name: CNetComm
short_description: The Christian Networking Community (CNetComm) web application project, developed in PHP MVC CodeIgniter Framework, is intended as a combination of Interactive Evangelism Portal with Social Networking site. Originally being developed for AG Philadelphia Church of Kirkland, it may be given to other Christian Organization to be used as their Internet portal. The project aims to provide a content portal for organizations and members to interact; facilitating the communication of Christians in their effort to share the Gospel and charitable practice as order by our Lord Jesus Christ.
summary: Web Application combination of Blog and Social Networking features.
